entry.dcterms:title: Realization of School Preferences of Secondary School Students in Hungary 1985
entry.dcterms:creator: Merkl, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-B08: Realization of School Preferences of Secondary School Students in Hungary 1985. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19

entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-02-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: realization of school preference in function of sociological indicators; the study structure of continued education related to original intentions and the applications; the job structure of those who did not continue education
entry.dcterms:subject: social and occupational mobility
labour and employment
education, school
demography
person
survey data
cross-section
A longitudinal study of the sample population in the survey about secondary school students and their choices of professions. 67,3% of the original sample could be reached.
Posted self-administered questionnaires.
A
